statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({5.56}+{6.23}\right)}={23.58}\approx{23.58}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{6.23}\cdot{4.26}={26.5398}\approx{26.5}.
